articles.title: I'm passionate about pushing the boundaries of what's possible and inspiring the next generation of innovators.
articles.subtitle: Chronological collection of my long-form thoughts on programming, leadership, product design, and more.

contact.title: Let's Get in Touch: Ways to Connect with Me
contact.description: Thank you for your interest in getting in touch with me. I welcome your feedback, questions, and suggestions. If you have a specific question or comment, please feel free to email me directly at <email>{{email}}</email>. I make an effort to respond to all messages within 24 hours, although it may take me longer during busy periods. If you prefer to connect on social media, you can find me on <linkedin>LinkedIn</linkedin>. Thanks again for your interest, and I look forward to hearing from you!

home.title: Full-stack web and mobile app developer, and squash enthusiast.
home.description1: Hey there! I'm Mustafa, a Full Stack Software Engineer at commercetools. I recently completed my M.Sc. Informatics at the Technical University of Munich, focusing on software-intensive systems. I got my Bachelor's in Computer Science from Lahore University of Management Sciences.
home.description2: Along my coding journey, I've played with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, Angular, ReactJS, React Native, and even fluttered around Flutter. Always eager to learn more!
home.description3: And if you're a fellow coder or recruiter in the area, let's connect! I'm all about expanding the network. See you around! ðŸš€

about.title: I'm Mustafa Asif. I live in Munich, where I design the future.
about.description: I've worked on a variety of projects over the years and I'm proud of the progress I've made. If you're interested in any of the projects I've worked on, please feel free to check out the code and suggest any improvements or enhancements you might have in mind. Collaborating with others is a great way to learn and grow, and I'm always open to new ideas and feedback.

projects.title: Things I've made trying to put my dent in the universe.
projects.subtitle: I've worked on a variety of projects over the years and I'm proud of the progress I've made. Many of these projects are open-source and available for others to explore and contribute to.

kapra-eid.title: Kapra Eid - Clothing Donation Application
kapra-eid.description: Designed and prototyped a complete application in Figma to bridge the gap between clothing donors and charitable organisations. Conducted extensive user research with 50+ participants, identified key pain points in the donation process, and created a user-friendly interface. The design reduced donation friction by 40% through simplified workflows and transparent tracking features.

web-ide.title: Web-Based IDE
web-ide.description: Designed and deployed a scalable web-based IDE with microservices architecture supporting C and Java compilation. Built with React frontend, Spring Boot backend services, Docker containerization, and Kubernetes orchestration. Features include syntax highlighting, real-time collaboration, GitLab OAuth integration, and Raspberry Pi hardware integration for dark mode. Successfully handled concurrent compilation requests from 5+ team members with 99% uptime.

pitstopai.title: Pitstop AI
pitstopai.description: AI-powered booking platform for service businesses. Customers book appointments 24/7 via AI agents on WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook Messenger. Multi-tenant B2B SaaS with Mastra-powered agents, smart calendar, analytics, and automated reminders. Built to help salons, clinics, and studios accept bookings without manual back-and-forth.
